def_cn: （通常指对政府的）信任投票
def_en: A vote of confidence is a vote in which members of a group are asked to indicate that they still support the person or group in power, usually the government.

def_cn: 赞同的表示;支持的表示
def_en: A vote of confidence is something that you say or do which shows that you approve of or support a person or a group.
